Package hu.elte.txtuml.api

Provides the txtUML modeling API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Collection<T extends ModelClass>
    Base interface for immutable collections of ModelClass objects.
    ModelElement
    Base interface for elements of the model.
    ModelValue
    Base interface for classes and interfaces that might be used in the model as types of attributes or types of parameters and return values of constructors and operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Class Action provides methods for the user to be used as statements of the action language of the model.
    Association
    A base class for associations in the model.
    AssociationEnd<T extends ModelClass>
    Abstract base class for association ends in the model.
    Collection.Empty<T extends ModelClass>
    A default implementation for an empty collection.
    Event
    Base class for events in the model.
    ExternalClass
    Base class for external classes in the model.
    Model
    Base class of txtUML models.
    ModelBool
    An immutable class representing booleans in the model.
    ModelBool.Else
    Else is a special ModelBool which always represents true.
    ModelClass
    Base class for classes in the model.
    ModelExecutor
    The class that manages the model execution.
    ModelExecutor.Settings
    Provides all the global settings of txtUML model execution through its static methods.
    ModelInt
    An immutable class representing integers in the model.
    ModelString
    An immutable class representing strings in the model.
    ModelType<T>
    Base class for immutable classes representing primitive types in the model.
    Region
    Base class for regions in the model.
    Signal
    Base class for signals in the model.
    StateMachine
    Base class for state machines in the model.
    VariableBool
    A mutable container of a ModelBool instance.
    VariableInt
    A mutable container of a ModelInt instance.
    VariableString
    A mutable container of a ModelString instance.
    VariableType<T,MT extends ModelType<T>>
    A mutable container of a specified ModelType instance.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ModelClass.Status
    The life cycle of a model object consists of steps represented by the constants of this enumeration type.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    From
    A runtime annotation to define the source vertex of a transition.
    To
    A runtime annotation to define the target vertex of a transition.
    Trigger
    A runtime annotation to define the trigger of a transition.

Package hu.elte.txtuml.api Description

Provides the txtUML modeling API. Through this API, it is possible to create and execute txtUML models, which are executable UML models written in text, embedded in Java. Visit http://txtuml.inf.elte.hu for more information about txtUML.

See the documentation of Model for an overview on modeling in txtUML.

Author:
Gabor Ferenc Kovacs
